extendedInfo.description: Break out the bamboo! Your black-and-white ball of fun is ready to play with you but he's hungry and a little dirty from rolling around in the forests of China. This bear is an endangered species, so if you adopt the little guy, you have to play with him, feed him, bathe him, help him study, and train him.

reviews.comment: I love pandas they are one of my most favorite animals. Please fix the game so the app doesnt close whenever i open or close the keyboard
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Take care of he/she and it lives happily. Neglet it and it dies. I love this app. :) i recommend all the virtual pets (v. Dog, and mycat)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Kind of boring... but the aim of lights is to make the entire board red... my panda just looks very sad...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Stupidest game
reviews.comment: Cute panda, but lame games and no direction whatsoever. Waste of my time. P.s. the environment is the future!
reviews.author: Abigail Mixon

reviews.comment: I love the game, its fun and is fun when ur bored, the panda is cute too!

reviews.comment: The panda is adorable but theres no instructions for the games, which all seem very confusing...

reviews.comment: The games have no instructions, wth r lights? The timing is horrible. Four dead panda\'s n I still do not get it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: My son killed my panda... lol there\'s no explanation for the games n the panda should grow or something. Needs better animation.

reviews.comment: Cute panda but doesnt work most of time n mini games give no inst.

reviews.comment: It so cute but i like virtual dog better like my panda always shake his belly its just wierd

reviews.comment: I like this app its fun to take care of the cute panda

reviews.comment: Couldn\'t start, wouldn\'t let me add a name. .. ! Very annoying!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Emily
reviews.comment: To everybody who does not like this game, TRY AGAIN. You may not have gotten it the first time cause there is no reason anybody should not like this game. You\'re lucky the panda is at least big. It\'s the best game. Try again, you\'ll be sure to like it. Is there something wrong with your device? Cuz I don\'t see how one person could possibly dislike this game even a bit! The downloading is so fast! It can\'t believe this super terrific game could load sooo fast!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: They\'re all right, don\'t get it, asks to play a minigame every time you do something, sooo annoying!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It took forever to install then it wouldnt let me name it and when i was finally able to name it the game said it was dead . . . Stupid game
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Cute game, the mini games are simple. Only and idiot wouldn\'t know how to play it. But the game is extremly slow and needs sound- milo :D

reviews.comment: I love it! Reminds me of my Giga pet in the \'90\'s. Take care & play w/it & it will live long & love u. Neglect it & it\'ll die just like a real pet.

reviews.comment: Cute game but its in fast forward....installed then un installed a minute later

reviews.comment: Its cute...needs sound and maybe more games and more ways to interact with the Panda...keep up good work

reviews.comment: Would be fun if there were directions. We\'ve killed 3 pandas already. Not sure what to do. Uninstalling now.
